description: User-level moderation, safety, and cross-posting preferences. Portable across AppViews.

main.description: User-level moderation and safety preferences. Portable across AppViews.

maturityLevel.description: Maximum maturity tier to show. Default: 'safe'.

mutedWords.description: Global muted words (apply to all communities).

mutedDids.description: Muted accounts (content de-emphasized, collapsed but visible).

crossPostDefaults.description: Per-service toggle for cross-posting new topics.

updatedAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when preferences were last updated.

bluesky.description: Cross-post new topics to Bluesky. Default: false.

frontpage.description: Cross-post new topics to Frontpage. Default: false.
